ygData.subject: Re: spell changes
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 5/25/99 6:07:46 PM Eastern Daylight Time, ... There is your problem, you solo.  Soloing is not 100% viable for most classes, though it gets
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 5/25/99 6:07:46 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
scan@... writes:

> I died so many times this weekend- it was pathetic and frustrating and had
> me seriously thinking about quitting the game altogether. I was trying to
> solo in Crushbone and I only go out of the zone transition area once. The
> trains would come in, my pet and I could handle all the green orcs and
> then a slaver or taskmaster would show up and it was all over.

There is your problem, you solo. Soloing is not 100% viable for most
classes, though it gets a bit better later on. You make more exp soloing,
but you die more too so it balances negatively most of the time.

Kalleon Valkyrre
Karana
